about.summary: A sphinx extension to include jinja based templates based documentation into a sphinx doc.

name: sphinx-jinja
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "sphinx-jinja" %}
{% set version = "1.1.1" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: "372406fe557be7c3f000ddd0ff130e7bb2d83f47df02e255fd24fe62d81ee143"

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - pbr
  run:
    - python
    - sphinx

test:
  imports:
    - sphinxcontrib.jinja

about:
  home: "https://github.com/tardyp/sphinx-jinja"
  license: "MIT"
  license_family: "MIT"
  license_file: "LICENSE"
  summary: "A sphinx extension to include jinja based templates based documentation into a sphinx doc."
  doc_url: "https://github.com/tardyp/sphinx-jinja/blob/master/README.rst"
  dev_url: "https://github.com/tardyp/sphinx-jinja"

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jonathansick
